imdb.plot outline: A new and exciting music series at Le Baron Chinatown, NYC Shot in high definition at Manhattan's most exclusive club, Encore! offers music fans a unique glimpse into the minds and meanderings of emerging talents such as Friends, The Virgins, Heartsrevolution, Theophilus London, Little Dragon and more to come.
imdb.title: Encore! Sessions
plot: A new and exciting music series at Le Baron Chinatown, NYC Shot in high definition at Manhattan's most exclusive club, Encore! offers music fans a unique glimpse into the minds and meanderings of emerging talents such as Friends, The Virgins, Heartsrevolution, Theophilus London, Little Dragon and more to come.::renaissance
